import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './modal.css' class EditUser extends Component { constructor() { super() //this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { dob: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", type: "".toUpperCase(), success: "", states: [], userList: [], sideBarUserList: [] } } render() { const Addresses = this.props.address && this.props.address.map(item => { return }) console.log(this.props.user) return (
Add or Remove Users
this.setEmail(e.target.value)} type="email" name="email" className="form-control w-100" id="email" value={this.props.user.email} aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="Enter email" required /> We'll never share your email with anyone else.
this.setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" name="password" className="form-control w-100" id="password" placeholder="Password" required /> We'll never share your email with anyone else.
this.setFirstName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="firstName" className="form-control w-100" id="firstName" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="First Name" />
this.setLastName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="lastName" className="form-control w-100" id="lastName" placeholder="Last Name" />
this.setDob(e.target.value)} type="date" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="unit" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />

{this.state.success}

); } } export default EditUser;
